TopicTitle: Mining Excavator breaking ships after time acceleration

Articles.Content:

Problem : after time accelerations gets back to normal , the mining drills (working) bump the ship high in the air, sometimes ending destroying it altogether

Mods installed : KerbalEngineer, MechJeb2 (didn't use any parts from it yet though)
